item.title: ü¶úüëøChaos Engineering The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to ret...
item.description:
ü¶úüëøChaos Engineering

The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic

ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to return invalid JSON, hallucinate, and have long response times

Can be used to stress test your system!

Blog: https://medium.com/@andrewnguonly/chatchaos-the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly-81f9612d7b00
item.author: LangChain

item.description:
ü¶úüí¨FastUI-Chat

Want to get an easy frontend for your LangChain app? All written in Python?

@Shroominic made an awesome example hooking up LangChain to FastUI (a new framework from the @pydantic team)

Check it out here: https://github.com/shroominic/fastui-chat/tree/main

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJack Gordley
Introducing ADB Chat, an LLM chatbot built with @LangchainAI, @streamlit, and the @Android Debug Bridge to aid in Android Forensics investigations. Simply plug in your Android Device and chat with files, processes, and other system info https://github.com/jgordley/chat-adb

item.title: RT Jack Gordley: Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJack Gordley
Excited to share my new Google Calendar assistant built with @nextjs, @FastAPI, and @MongoDB. Core logic built using @LangChainAI and the @OpenAI API. A lot is possible right now using LLMs and simple tool definitions, such as the GCal API specs: https://gordles.io/posts/calvin

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: How @LangChainAI improved context for lyric continuation from limited seeds:‚ú≥Ô∏èRetrieve most relevant chunks‚ú≥Ô∏èGet full parent docs...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇRoger Taylor
How @LangChainAI improved context for lyric continuation from limited seeds:‚ú≥Ô∏èRetrieve most relevant chunks‚ú≥Ô∏èGet full parent docs for complete style/tone‚ú≥Ô∏èOr, retrieve bigger chunks, more context while fitting LLM limits.
See Mahesh Deshwal walkthru: https://buff.ly/47WN6JU

item.title: RT Hard Kothari: Another week and some great updates by @LangChainAI The newsletter is out and below is my short üîëtake away: LangChain v0.1 Langcha...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇHard Kothari
Another week and some great updates by @LangChainAI

The newsletter is out and below is my short üîëtake away:

LangChain v0.1
Langchain is splitting its code in
- langchain: Main Congnitive Architecture
- langchain-core: Abstractions and LCEL
- langchain-community: 3rd Party‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736765123224555687

RT‚ÄÇSebastian Rojo

RT‚ÄÇDaniel San
Introducing @MistralAI as your copilot in VSCode! üöÄ

Effortlessly integrate Mistral AI with CodeGPT to enhance your coding experience.

- mistral-tiny
- mistral-small

Check the documentation here: https://docs.codegpt.co/docs/tutorial-ai-providers/mistral

item.title: RT Vinit Agrawal: Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API. Sel...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇVinit Agrawal
Made a video about using LangChain's (@LangChainAI) Self-Querying Query Constructor and use it in Slack's (@SlackHQ) search API.

Self-Querying is usually used with vector stores like @weaviate_io, but here I am using it for Slack's search.

Check it out:
https://youtu.be/DTifxo4hhzA?si=knQ87py3QGvMr2ws
item.author: LangChain
